CustomField.description: Controls how new portal users are created. Self_Register matches email domain to existing Accounts. Invite_Only requires pre-existing Contacts (admin provisions). Account_Contact creates both (legacy). Existing_Only requires pre-existing Contacts (legacy).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Self_Register: users sign up and are matched to existing Accounts by email domain. Invite_Only: users must already exist as Contacts (admin provisions from Salesforce). Account_Contact (legacy): creates new Account + Contact. Existing_Only (legacy): requires pre-existing Contacts.
CustomField.label: Registration Mode
